title: Subly
description:
Subly is the all-in-one platform and AI agent built to automate accessibility for pre-recorded video and audio.

Its Video Accessibility Checker scans content frame by frame, flagging issues with time-coded precision. The Accessibility Editor lets you fix them instantly—auto-correct with AI or fine-tune manually in seconds. And when AI isn’t enough, expert services are built in.

Subly makes accessibility faster, easier, and more reliable—helping you save time and publish with confidence.
